datapack.description: Heavy language features for MCFunction files
datapack.commands.regenerateCache.title: Regenerate Cache
datapack.config.env.dataVersion: The version of the completion data, including registries, block definitions, and nbtdoc. Should be an identity in the [version manifest](https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json) which was released after `19w40a`. Apart from a version identity, you can also input `Latest release` or `Latest snapshot` here (case-insensitive).
datapack.config.env.dependsOnVanilla: Whether this datapack depends on the vanilla datapack or not. If this option is enabled, completions for the corresponding data of the vanilla datapack will be provided.
datapack.config.env.cmdVersion: The version of the command tree. Only major versions are available.
datapack.config.features.codeActions: Whether DHP should provide code actions or not.
datapack.config.features.colors: Whether DHP should provide color supports or not.
datapack.config.features.completions: Whether DHP should provide completions or not.
datapack.config.features.documentHighlig: Whether DHP should provide document highlighting or not.
datapack.config.features.documentLinks: Whether DHP should provide document links or not.
datapack.config.features.foldingRanges: Whether DHP should provide folding ranges or not.
datapack.config.features.formatting: Whether DHP should provide formatting feature or not.
datapack.config.features.hover: Whether DHP should provide hover information or not.
datapack.config.features.semanticColorin: Whether DHP should provide semantic coloring or not.
datapack.config.features.selectionRanges: Whether DHP should provide selection ranges or not.
datapack.config.features.signatures: Whether DHP should provide signature information for commands or not.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateBracketSp: Enforce spacing inside the square brackets of block states.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateCommaSpac: Enforce spacing around commas in block states. No matter what the settings are, spaces after trailing commas are always removed.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateEqualSpac: Enforce spacing around equal signs in block states.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateTrailingC: Whether there should be a trailing comma after the last key-value pair in block states or not.
datapack.config.lint.eol: Enforce the end of line (EOL) character in `mcfunction` files.
datapack.config.lint.nbtArrayBracketSpac: Enforce spacing inside the square brackets of NBT arrays.
datapack.config.lint.nbtArrayCommaSpacin: Enforce spacing around commas in NBT arrays. No matter what the settings are, spaces after trailing commas are always removed.
datapack.config.lint.nbtArraySemicolonSp: Enforce spacing after semicolons in NBT arrays. No matter what the setting is, spaces after the semicolon are always removed if the array is empty.
datapack.config.lint.nbtArrayTrailingCom: Whether there should be a trailing comma after the last number in NBT arrays or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtByteSuffix: Enforce the suffix of NBT byte tags.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundBracketS: Enforce spacing inside the curly brackets of NBT compounds.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundColonSpa: Enforce spacing around colons in NBT compounds.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundCommaSpa: Enforce spacing around commas in NBT compounds. No matter what the settings are, spaces after trailing commas are always removed.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundTrailing: Whether there should be a trailing comma after the last key-value pair in NBT compounds or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtDoubleOmitSuffix: Whether or not to omit the suffix of NBT double numbers if possible.
datapack.config.lint.nbtDoubleSuffix: Enforce the suffix of NBT double tags.
datapack.config.lint.nbtFloatSuffix: Enforce the suffix of NBT float tags.
datapack.config.lint.nbtListBracketSpaci: Enforce spacing inside the square brackets of NBT lists.
datapack.config.lint.nbtListCommaSpacing: Enforce spacing around commas in NBT lists. No matter what the settings are, spaces after trailing commas are always removed.
datapack.config.lint.nbtListTrailingComm: Whether there should be a trailing comma after the last number in NBT lists or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtLongSuffix: Enforce the suffix of NBT long tags.
datapack.config.lint.nbtShortSuffix: Enforce the suffix of NBT short tags.
datapack.config.lint.selectorBracketSpac: Enforce spacing inside the square brackets of entity selectors.
datapack.config.lint.selectorCommaSpacin: Enforce spacing around commas in entity selectors. No matter what the settings are, spaces after trailing commas are always removed.
datapack.config.lint.selectorEqualSpacin: Enforce spacing around equal signs in entity selectors.
datapack.config.lint.selectorTrailingCom: Whether there should be a trailing comma after the last key-value pair in entity selectors or not.
datapack.config.lint.timeOmitTickUnit: Whether or not to omit the tick units (`t`) of time arguments.
datapack.config.lint.blockStateSortKeys: Enforce the values in a block state to be sorted by the keys.
datapack.config.lint.idOmitDefaultNamesp: Whether or not the default namespaces in namespaced IDs should be omitted. No matter what the setting is, namespaces in predicates (e.g. `nbt` selector argument, `execute if data`) should always be kept.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfNbtCompoundTa: Enforce a consistent NBT compound key naming convention.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfObjectives: Enforce a consistent scoreboard objective naming convention.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfTags: Enforce a consistent entity tag naming convention.
datapack.config.lint.nameOfTeams: Enforce a consistent team naming convention.
datapack.config.lint.nbtBoolean: Whether to use boolean literals to represent boolean-like NBT bytes or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundKeyQuote: Whether to quote keys in NBT compounds or not.
Enforce the type of NBT compound key quotation marks.
datapack.config.lint.nbtCompoundSortKeys: Whether to sort keys in NBT compounds or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtPathQuote: Whether to quote keys in NBT paths or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtPathQuoteType: Enforce the type of NBT path key quotation marks. Because of [MC-175504](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-175504) you should _never_ use single quotes for NBT path keys.
datapack.config.lint.nbtStringQuote: Whether to quote string arguments or not.
datapack.config.lint.nbtStringQuoteType: Enforce the type of NBT string quotation marks.
datapack.config.lint.nbtTypeCheck: Check the types of the NBT values.
datapack.config.lint.selectorKeyQuote: Whether to quote entity selector keys or not.
datapack.config.lint.selectorKeyQuoteTyp: Enforce the type of entity selector key quotation marks.
datapack.config.lint.selectorSortKeys: Enforce the values in an entity selector to be sorted by the keys.
datapack.config.lint.strictAdvancementCh: Show diagnostics for advancements that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictBlockCheck: Show diagnostics for blocks that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictBlockTagCheck: Show diagnostics for block tags that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictBossbarCheck: Show diagnostics for bossbars that haven't been defined in the workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictDimensionType: Show diagnostics for dimensions that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictEnchantmentCh: Show diagnostics for enchantments that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictEntityTypeChe: Show diagnostics for entity types that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictEntityTypeTag: Show diagnostics for entity type tags that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFluidCheck: Show diagnostics for fluids that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictFluidTagCheck: Show diagnostics for fluid tags that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFunctionCheck: Show diagnostics for functions that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictFunctionTagCh: Show diagnostics for function tags that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictItemCheck: Show diagnostics for items that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictItemTagCheck: Show diagnostics for item tags that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictLootTableChec: Show diagnostics for loot tables that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictMobEffectChec: Show diagnostics for mob effects that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictMotiveCheck: Show diagnostics for painting motives that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictObjectiveChec: Show diagnostics for scoreboard objectives that haven't been defined in the workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictParticleTypeC: Show diagnostics for particle types that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictPotionCheck: Show diagnostics for potions that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictPredicateChec: Show diagnostics for predicates that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictRecipeCheck: Show diagnostics for recipes that don't exist in the current workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictSoundEventChe: Show diagnostics for sound events that don't exist in the registry.
datapack.config.lint.strictStorageCheck: Show diagnostics for storages that haven't been defined in the workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictTagCheck: Show diagnostics for tags that haven't been defined in the workspace.
datapack.config.lint.strictTeamCheck: Show diagnostics for teams that haven't been defined in the workspace.
datapack.config.lint.stringQuote: Whether to quote string arguments or not.
datapack.config.lint.stringQuoteType: Enforce the type of string argument quotation marks.
